summary: Implements the Home Assistant Z‑Wave light platform, defining a light entity that communicates with Z‑Wave devices to report and control power state, brightness, color temperature, hue‑saturation and related attributes, and handling asynchronous setup and state synchronization.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to add, control, and automate Z‑Wave lighting fixtures—turning them on/off, dimming, adjusting color and temperature—through a unified interface and integration with Home Assistant automations and dashboards.
